name: Ninja Descent
description:
Ninja Descent is a game about a ninja who is having a hard time with his training.

Ninja Descent is a new type of game known as an RTNS (really tight ninja simulator) in which you will experience:

-Super advanced ragdoll technology
-In-game Ninja Shop
-Groundbreaking controls that bring touchscreen gaming to a new level
-Jaw-dropping physics
-Ninja hats
-Antics and/or shenanigans
